Clinical Guidance

Please select your clinical context and answer the questions to receive personalized guidance.

Important: Thrombocytopenia occurs in 8-10% of pregnancies, usually mild but can have severe complications.

Joint Haematology and Obstetric Clinic: All non-urgent referrals should be directed here.

Urgent cases: Contact ANC or labor ward for immediate review and liaise with a hematologist if needed.
